mng: to teach, to train, to admonish, instruction (from superiors), teachings, rule

exm.mng: to cultivate, to train, to groom, training
military practice, esp. for reservists or new recruits, military training as a (sometimes compulsory) subject in schools and colleges, drill
to reprimand, to rebuke, to berate, stern criticism
lesson, moral, to chide sb, to lecture sb
